short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your LeetCode companion - Track and record your coding progress
short.zh_CN: 你的 LeetCode 刷题助手，记录每一步学习历程

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed to optimize your LeetCode practice with intelligent tracking and analytics.

Key Features:
- Smart Timer: Automatically tracks your problem-solving time with gentle reminders every 10 minutes to prevent getting stuck
- Progress Tracking: Records time spent and submission history for each problem
- Learning Analytics: Generates personalized review recommendations based on your performance and forgetting curve
- Local Storage: All data stored locally with export options, seamlessly integrates with other tools

Perfect for programmers and job seekers who want to make their algorithm practice more efficient. Let data drive your coding journey!
